channel.title: Self hosting signature equal empty
channel.description:
I am trying to use a self hosting After sending the init request, the response is received successfully curl 'header_callback' Did not send the signature header when checking the signature the app got aborted signature = "";, why does this problem occur and how do I solve it?
'header_callback' data
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Server: Microsoft-IIS/10.0 X-Powered-By: PHP/8.0.0 X-Powered-By: ASP.NET Date: Wed, 21 Sep 2022 09:55:55 GMT Content-Length: 211

item.title: Self hosting signature equal empty
item.dc:creator: mak
item.description:
We don’t help with selfhosting unless the person purchases KeyAuth enterprise https://shop.keyauth.cc/product/keyauth-enterprise

The community site is closed now. You can ask your question in the #coding channel of the Discord server KeyAuth

Nobody is required to help you though. If your question is easy to solve with Google, people will likely ignore you.

Read full topic
